translations: 组曲；变奏曲（partita 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Bach: Sonatas & Partitas for Solo V…
sentences.translation: 巴赫无伴奏小提琴奏鸣曲和组曲集（…

sentences.sentence: Thus I have gone through the three partitas of learning Buddhism.
sentences.translation: 这三步曲就这样走了下来。

sentences.sentence: J·S·Bach composed Partitas—German Suite which consists of six suites during the years of 1726-1731.
sentences.translation: 巴赫于1726-1731年间创作的古钢琴作品《帕蒂塔》（德国组曲），共六首。
